Ok, a few things that i'll need to clear up here. 

1) Having a base is well within the respectable rules. However, 
having a base requires you to either land a ship on the planet and 
call it a base, or to build it. Neither of which you have done. You 
have to post for everything that you want to happen; leave nothing 
out. Say you have have a base, then people need to have seen it land 
on the planet, and then they could go and investigate. There is 
virtually no way that a whole ship can land on the planet withough 
being either seen or picked up on vast array of base scanners around 
the world. =)

2) Go to the following webpage, and read up on posting style and 
form. It helps for clarity of your messages, and also helps with the 
flow of the game itself. =)

http://www.nbwrpg.com/~rauq/howto.shtml

Also, make sure you pay attention to other peoples posts for ideas 
on how to roleplay your characters, and for various forms of 
posting. Everyone has their own style, so you aren't expected to 
have a certain style. =)
